DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Negative Surgical Margin Other Performed Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of another surgical method, not previously mentioned, that was performed to achieve negative surgical margins.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Other Negative Surgical Margin Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Indicates the absence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Indicates the absence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Indicates the absence of tumor cells at the edge of a surgically excised specimen.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CTSP Kidney Clinical Data Form for TCGA sample breast, lung, and kidney surgeries. mc 9/11/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
